assessments.status_rationale: No items in TODAY_NEWS_BULLETS report NYMEX WTI front-month settlement prices or any day settling at/above $95; the claim remains unverified from the provided news.
No bullet indicates an OFAC Iran-related sanctions action designating 10+ entities/vessels tied to Iran oil/petrochemical exports; no relevant sanctions announcement is cited.
No bullet references the European Commission opening formal DSA proceedings against TikTok, nor mentions addictive design or recommender-system risks.
No bullet indicates TikTok publicly confirmed EU product changes limiting infinite scroll or materially altering recommendations to address EU concerns.
No bullet provides Microsoft quarterly financial statement data (property and equipment additions/capex) to confirm or refute the $25B+ quarter condition.
No bullet mentions Norway’s NSM/NCSC (or similar) publishing an advisory/report naming 'Salt Typhoon'; the needed evidence is absent.
No bullet reports a UN Security Council resolution on Haiti expanding/renewing a security mandate with additional personnel or expanded rules of engagement.
No bullet references the Gateway Development Commission/USDOT/FRA executing an FFGA (or equivalent full-funding commitment) for the Hudson Tunnel Project.
No bullet describes a USTR/Commerce announcement of new or increased numerically specified tariffs/trade restrictions targeting Chinese EVs or battery materials.
